short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to read more articles on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Today I Read" is a browser extension that allows you to save and organize articles and links you come across while browsing the internet. With just a few clicks, you can easily save any article or link to your personal reading list for later.
